body_html: @fchollet So is this the same conclusion comment for keras-team/keras#6050? I think that unifying the API it could be great but it is not a short term solution. Many standard tensorflow metrics are not covered in Keras so I think that we need to document this in some ways also if the documentation will be "don't try this at home".

body: @fchollet So is this the same conclusion comment for https://github.com/keras-team/keras/issues/6050? I think that unifying the API it could be great but it is not a short term solution. Many standard tensorflow metrics are not covered in Keras so I think that we need to document this in some ways also if the documentation will be "don't try this at home".
